wizard.name: Python4Capella project
wizard.description: Creates the Python4Capella project with Python API to interact with Capella models.

template.name: import simplified_api.capella (Python4Capella)
template.pattern: # include needed for the Capella modeller API include('workspace://Python4Capella/simplified_api/capella.py') if False: from simplified_api.capella import *

template.name: import utilities.CapellaPlatform (Python4Capella)
template.pattern: # include needed for utilities include('workspace://Python4Capella/utilities/CapellaPlatform.py') if False: from utilities.CapellaPlatform import *

template.name: import simplified_api.requirement (Python4Capella)
template.pattern: # include needed for the requirement API include('workspace://Python4Capella/simplified_api/requirement.py') if False: from simplified_api.requirement import *

template.name: import simplified_api.pvmt (Python4Capella)
template.pattern: # include needed for the pvmt API include('workspace://Python4Capella/simplified_api/pvmt.py') if False: from simplified_api.pvmt import *

template.name: import simplified_api.diagram (Python4Capella)
template.pattern: # include needed for the Capella modeller API include('workspace://Python4Capella/simplified_api/diagram.py') if False: from simplified_api.diagram import *

template.description: Add a transaction for a Capella model
template.name: transaction
template.pattern:
aird_path = ''
model = CapellaModel() model.open(aird_path)
# gets the SystemEngineering se = model.get_system_engineering()
# start a transaction to modify the Capella model model.start_transaction() try: # Do something here print(se.get_name()) ${cursor} except: # if something went wrong we rollback the transaction model.rollback_transaction() raise else: # if everything is ok we commit the transaction model.commit_transaction()
# save the Capella model
model.save()

template.description: Initialize the module to use Python4Capella
template.name: Module: Python4Capella

template.description: Initialize the module to use Python4Capella and the requirements addon
template.name: Module: Python4Capella + Requirements

template.description: Initialize the module to use Python4Capella and the PVMT addon
template.name: Module: Python4Capella + PVMT
